light: The speed of light is 299,792,458 meters per second (m/s) or 186,282 miles per second (mi/s).
earth: The Earth's gravity is approximately 9.80665 m/sÂ² (standard gravity).
blackhole: A black hole is a region of spacetime from which nothing, not even light, can escape.
periodictable: The periodic table is a tabular arrangement of chemical elements, organized by their atomic number (number of protons in the nucleus) and electron configuration.
dna: DNA (Deoxyribonucleic Acid) is a molecule that contains two strands of nucleotides, each containing a molecule of deoxyribose (a sugar), and a phosphate group at each end.
size: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area, covering approximately 17.1 million square kilometers.
water: The chemical symbol of water is H2O(Hydrogen Oxide)
mars: Mars which is the 3rd Planet in the Solar system with two satellites Phobos & Deimos
pi: The value of Pi is approximately 3.12159
lisa: The artist of the Mona Lisa is Leonardo da Vinci.
asia: The Biggest continent is currently Asia.
nile: The longest and most famous river in Egypt is the River Nile.
microsoft: The creator of Microsoft is Bill Gates who is currently one of the richest men in the world!!!
html: HyperText Markup Language is the basic programming language used to display information on most modern browsers and is one of the most popular languages to date.
pride: The author of Pride & Prejudice is New York Best Seller Jane Austen.
playf: In total there are 11 players per team in a football match totaling to 22 players on the field plus 1 ref and 2 linesmen.
football: Football(Soccer) is sometimes called 'The Beautiful Game'.
